translations.literal: Emperor Wen was Gaozu's middle son, born to Lady Bo. In the eleventh year of Gaozu's reign, after executing Chen Xi and pacifying the Dai territories, he was enfeoffed as King of Dai with his capital at Zhongdu. In autumn of the seventeenth year, Empress Gao passed away. The various members of the Lü clan plotted rebellion and sought to endanger the Liu family. Chancellor Chen Ping, Grand Commandant Zhou Bo, and Zhu Xu Marquis Liu Zhang joined forces to execute them and plotted to establish the King of Dai on the throne. The account is in the Annals of Empress Gao and the Biographies of the Five Kings of Gao.
